<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rte_eb_operation"><sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><conditional_fields/><conditional_script><![CDATA[/* Example Script
(function(batch, output) {
    for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
        
        // step1: access the input variables
        var a = batch[i].input;

        // step2: your script code goes here
        var b = a + " (Now)";

        // setp3: set the output for each element
        output[i] = b;
    }
})(batch, output);
*/
(function(batch, output) {

})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Multiple Input Script - u_card_has_shelf_key,u_card_has_parent_card_key</name><operation_group/><order>700</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {
		var shelf = batch[i].u_card_has_shelf_key;
    var parentCard = batch[i].u_card_has_parent_card_key;

		var util = new EXFOImportUtil();
    var neKey = util.relationshipLookup(shelf, 'ne');
     
    output[i] = neKey;
	}
})(batch, output);
]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field/><source_sys_rte_eb_fields>b41f467f8740c910c4a3c99d0ebb3598,fc1f467f8740c910c4a3c99d0ebb3592</source_sys_rte_eb_fields><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>aveenstra</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-08 21:31:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>c66501bd871c0150c4a3c99d0ebb35fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Multiple Input Script - u_card_has_shelf_key,u_card_has_parent_card_key</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO" source="x_exfo2_cmdb">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="SG-EXFO Cards">344c0a5487f778103e867518cebb35f2</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">f74c4e9487f778103e867518cebb3542</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation_c66501bd871c0150c4a3c99d0ebb35fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>aveenstra</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-08 21:31:22</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field/><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Multiple Input Script">a5584ee4739000102b6265a751ab9eae</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_multi_in_script_operation></record_update>
